titleStmt.title: Dory Nell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG3044

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1859-1862

body.p:
Metcalfe Co Ky May the 30th 1862
Mr Nat. Gaither Jr

will you be kind enough to examine the regesters office and see if there was pattent issued in the name of Francis Yates bearing date about the year 1842 for 147 acres ^of land^ in the county of Barren on the Eastfork of Little Barren river beginning ^on^ Waddy Tompson line of a 500 acre survey thence runing to the mouth of Hutchesson.s branch &c and So on, if you find the description to suit please write to me and if not write also and in so doing you will oblidge a friend
N. B. it may be that Yates had a letter in his name
direct yours to East Fork P O Metcalfe, co. Ky
